alert.note: Alert for Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 3:34PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Fulton and southern Herkimer Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 334 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Middleville, or 10 miles north of Little Falls, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Falls, Dolgeville, Ohio, Newport, Middleville, Poland, Cold Brook, Northwood, Russia, Oppenheim, Fairfield, Norway, Ingham Mills, Curtis, Lotville, Rasbach Corner, Burrell Corners, Kelhi Corners, Shedd Corners and Phipps Corners. This includes Interstate 90 near exit 29A. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer
